WRITING.TEXT: It's sick to be honest. A lot of teachers play their students down or dissuade them from an art career.
Horrifying. Feels like you're being crushed, occasionally seeing and hearing stuff from your dream while being conscious.
Art. I had a shitty teacher who had a huge ego. Showed her that I could do better than she thought I could.
Hoping your friend has access to stickers like that... if not...
The sweet sound of mom bringing home groceries.
I have to be friends with a guy before we date- otherwise I really probably don't have that much to talk about with you.
I love the choice of colors and the repetitive shapes. Symmetry is pleasing.
Pokemon or Harvest Moon. Yeah I'm that kid.
Art. Just knowing that I can evoke some emotion- on any level- whether it be bad or good- makes me feel like I have some part in this world.
You mean buy? That is an option hah.
